## Section 1. Introduction

To explore video games and their popularity.

## Section 2. Data Analysis Plan

- Does prrice make for a higher or lower metacritic score?

- What are the correlations between when a game waS released and what they are priced?

- Does metacritic score have any effect on average playtime?

## Section 3. Data

Our dataset comes from TidyTuesday 2019-07-30 which includes around 9000 videogames, including their release date, price, owners, developer, publisher, average playtime, median playtime, and metacritic score. The dataset is in tidy format.
